hero.title: An Architectural Masterpiece in Punta del Este
hero.subtitle: Where luxury meets the Atlantic horizon

intro.label: The Residence
intro.title: A sanctuary of contemporary elegance
intro.description: Nestled in the most exclusive neighborhood of Punta del Este, this architectural gem redefines coastal luxury living. Every detail has been meticulously crafted to create a harmonious blend of sophisticated design and natural beauty.

design.title: Contemporary Design
design.description: Clean lines and floor-to-ceiling windows frame breathtaking ocean views

materials.title: Premium Materials
materials.description: Imported marble, hardwood floors, and state-of-the-art fixtures throughout

outdoor.title: Expansive Outdoor Living
outdoor.description: Infinity pool, outdoor kitchen, and terraces designed for entertainment

smart.title: Smart Home Technology
smart.description: Fully integrated automation for lighting, climate, and security

cta.title: Experience Unparalleled Luxury
cta.description: Discover your dream home in Punta del Este

hero.title: The Heart of Punta del Este
hero.subtitle: Where exclusivity meets convenience

intro.label: Prime Location
intro.title: Perfectly positioned in Uruguay's most prestigious destination
intro.description: Located in the sought-after La Barra district, this property offers the perfect balance of privacy and accessibility. Just minutes from pristine beaches, world-class dining, and cultural attractions, while maintaining the tranquility of a gated community.

beach.title: José Ignacio Beach
beach.description: Pristine white sand beaches and crystal-clear waters

marina.title: Punta del Este Marina
marina.description: World-class marina with luxury yachts and waterfront dining

golf.title: La Barra Golf Club
golf.description: Championship golf course designed by renowned architects

restaurants.title: Gourmet Restaurants
restaurants.description: Fine dining experiences from international celebrity chefs

cta.title: Live Where Life Unfolds
cta.description: Discover the perfect location for your dream home

intro.label: The Community
intro.title: A private oasis of luxury and tranquility
intro.description: La Cancillería represents the pinnacle of residential development in Punta del Este. This gated community offers residents an unparalleled lifestyle with world-class amenities, 24/7 security, and meticulously landscaped grounds that blend seamlessly with the natural environment.

clubhouse.title: Private Clubhouse
clubhouse.description: Elegant social spaces for gatherings and events

pool.title: Resort-Style Pool
pool.description: Heated infinity pool with poolside service

security.title: 24/7 Security
security.description: Gated entrance with professional security team

concierge.title: Concierge Service
concierge.description: Dedicated staff to attend to your every need

cta.title: Join an Elite Community
cta.description: Experience the ultimate in coastal living
